item.title: 'Ms. Marvel' Latest News and Updates
item.description: The Marvel Disney Plus series follows Kamala Khan. As a young Pakistani-American teenager, Kamala is a quirky Avengers fangirl who idolizes the heroes who saved her world, especially Captain Marvel. While she prefers to live in her superhero fantasies and focus less on her real life, her dreams become a reality when she comes into superpowers of her own. Wielding mysterious bracelets that allow her to augment her mass, Kamala gets to be the superhero she's always wanted to be.

item.title: Did Kim Kardashian Really Sue Roblox? She's Faced with Sex Tape Backlash on 'The Kardashians'
item.description: Kim Kardashian mentions she might need to sue Roblox in the series premiere of 'The Kardashians,' but did she really take legal action against the mobile game? We all know Kim Kardashian is no stranger to how the law works. She studied to be a lawyer after all, and her late father, Robert Kardashian, was a respected attorney. So when Kim says in The Kardashians series premiere that she thinks she needs to sue Roblox for using her likeness in a game, it probably shouldn't be taken lightly.

item.title: Nathan Triska - Age, Family, Bio
Shushing Nigerians Who Want Change Of Government Is Ominous
item.description: Telling the citizenry to shut up over an issue as important as how they are governed or who governs them is clearly an abbreviation of their rights, and is as insensitive as it is cold-hearted. In the circumstance, it can be argued that it isn’t just their right to freedom of expression that is being tampered with but their right to dignity, Personal Liberty as well as their right to Freedom of Thought and Conscience.

item.title: 'Star Wars' Latest News and Updates
item.description: A long time ago in a galaxy far, far away... The beloved characters of Star Wars first came on the scene in 1977, and it's safe to say the world (nay, the galaxy) has never been the same since. The pop-culture phenomenon has gone far beyond the realm of mere film franchise with titles spanning nearly every medium you can imagine. From television series to video games to books to comics to LEGO sets to toys to home decor — if you're a Star Wars fan, there's a lot out there for you to take part in.

item.title: Glenn Fitzgerald - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: American actor who has played roles in various movies and television series including The Sixth Sense and 40 Days and 40 Nights. Before Fame He was a Calvin Klein model in the 1980s and 1990s before he started acting. Trivia He appeared in the music video for Natalie Imbruglia's 1998 song Wishing I Was There. Family Life He grew up with his family in Brooklyn, New York. Associated With He starred opposite Julianne Nicholson in the 2009 play THIS at Playwright Horizons in New York.

item.title: Jesse Jackson (Civil Rights Leader) - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: American civil rights activist and Baptist minister who was a candidate for the Democratic presidential nomination in 1984 and 1988. He also served as a shadow U.S. Senator for the District of Columbia from 1991 to 1997. Before Fame He attended a racially segregated high school as a student-athlete, demonstrating skill in baseball and football. Trivia He founded Rainbow/PUSH in 1971 and was heavily involved in the Southern Christian Leadership Conference during the 1960's.

item.title: Molly O'Malia - Age, Family, Bio
BBNaija Housemate, Laycon Bags Endorsement Deal with House of Lunettes
item.description: Big Brother Naija Lockdown housemate, Laycon has bagged am endorsement deal with House of Lunettes. The rapper who is still in the house and looks like fans’ favourite with his ever increasing social media following, is the first ever contestant on the BBN reality TV show to achieve this feat. Laycon’s social media handles; Instagram and Twitter, shared the news of the deal and fans of the 26-year-old dubbed Aristotle by fellow housemates are said to have crashed the site under 1 hour since the news broke.

item.title: See How the TLC Star Is Doing Today
item.description: How is Irene from 'My 600-lb Life' doing now? After appearing on the TLC series, did she end up losing more weight and getting weight loss surgery? For those who watch My 600-Life, one of the most frustrating parts of the TLC series is that it often ends with a cliffhanger. Viewers become emotionally invested in the journeys of the morbidly obese individuals featured on the series — only to be left wondering how they're doing today.

item.title: Who Are Katie Price's Children? Details on Her Family Life and Kids
item.description: Katie Price's Children Have Been Her Source of Joy Amid Three DivorcesBy Katie GarrityUpdated Jan. 15 2021, 11:49 a.m. ET Source: InstagramFormer U.K. model and reality television star Katie Price has seen her fair share of hardship and controversy — typically showcased in British tabloids. Her personal life has been chronicled since she came on the scene in the early 90s. Katie has been married three times, and with each marriage, she had children.

item.title: Airbnb Guest Asks If "Theres a Cap" on Rules for Rental Property During Her Stay
item.description: An Airbnb renter goes over the many rules, signs, and warnings at her rental, which asks the question of how worth it the location really is. Source: TikTok/@beckypearlatxThere was a time when renting an Airbnb was almost a novelty to some. Now, it feels more like a chore to those same people. And after a user on TikTok by the name of Becky Levin Narvarro (@beckypearlatx) shared her experience with the amount of rules and instructions she faced at her rental, I can't really blame the anti-Airbnb movement for its thoughts on the rental property company.

item.title: Inside Allegations Against Marcus Shoberg From The Bachelorette
item.description: Allegations Against 'The Bachelorette's Marcus Shoberg Were Shared on Social MediaMarcus Shoberg is one of Jenn Tran's final four on 'The Bachelorette.' By Chrissy BobicPublished Aug. 13 2024, 12:00 p.m. ET Source: Instagram/@marcus__edwardWhen contestants apply to be on any show in The Bachelor franchise, they subject themselves to heavy vetting by producers and fans alike. Sometimes, people from their past come out in surprising ways. When multiple women made allegations against Marcus Shoberg on Reddit, plenty of Bachelorette fans were a bit shook by the implications.

item.title: Is Avani in 'Chicken Girls' Season 6? Details on Her Character
Season Of Snake Invasion: Another Man Discovers Huge Snake In His WC In Lagos
item.description: There seems to be a recurring case of snake invasions after another man discovered a snake in his water closed at his apartment in Mary land Lagos. A video making rounds on social media, captured the moment the snake was seen moving around the toilet trying to find its way out of the toilet. The yet-to-be-identified man noted that he lived close to the canal and had found the snake on the floor of his toilet.

item.title: Chip and Joanna Gaines Latest News and Updates
item.description: Home renovation couple Chip and Joanna Gaines got their big break on HGTV's hit show Fixer Upper, which took place in Waco, Texas, and followed Chip and Joanna as they worked with families to buy and remodel homes in the area. The show premiered in 2014 and ran for five seasons before coming to an end in 2017. Along the way, Fixer Upper introduced viewers to the couple's five children and their handy helpers Dustin Anderson and Clint Harp.

item.title: Eric Mondo - Age, Family, Bio
Is Chris Martin Leaving Coldplay? Inside His Post-Band Plans
item.description: Is Chris Martin Leaving Coldplay? He Already Has Post-Band Plans for BroadwayBy Anna GarrisonJun. 5 2022, Published 2:59 p.m. ET Source: Getty ImagesMusician Chris Martin is best known as the co-founder of the band Coldplay in 1996. The band's success through songs such as "Yellow," "Clocks," "The Scientist," "Fix You," and "Viva La Vida" skyrocketed them to worldwide fame and 30 nominations at the Brit Awards (winning nine). They have been considered one of the most awarded rock groups of all time and one of the most successful rock bands of the 21st century.

item.title: Pete Buttigieg - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: United States politician who is known for having served as the 32nd Mayor of South Bend, Indiana. He gained attention in 2019 when he announced his run for Presidency during the 2020 election. He is a member of the Democratic party and is a veteran known for having served a tour in Afghanistan and as a Naval Intelligence Officer. He became the United States Secretary of Transportation in 2021. Before Fame He graduated from Harvard University and Oxford University.

item.title: Big Blow For APC As Ex-National Scribe, Akpanudoedehe Dumps Party
item.description: The All Progressives Congress, APC, has lost yet another party big wig, Senator John James Akpanudoedehe. Naija News understands that the former National Secretary of the ruling party confirmed his membership withdrawal in a letter dated June 4, 2022, which was addressed to the APC chairman of his Offot Ward 6, in Uyo, Akwa Ibom State. Akpanudoedehe’s resignation is coming amidst controversies surrounding the party in an effort to pick a candidate for the 2023 general elections.

item.title: Buhari's corruption war to extend beyond GEJ's administration
item.description: - President Buhari has extended the investigation of corrupt practices beyond Jonathan's administration - There are indications that administration before Jonathan began the scheme of adding non-exiting projects to budget - The minister of justice says there is a compilation of agencies that have allowed these corrupt practices to thrive There are strong indications that President Muhammadu Buhari will extend his crackdown on corruption beyond the administration of former president, Goodluck Jonathan.

item.title: Kaylee Hottle Is the Deaf Actress Stealing the Spotlight in 'Godzilla vs. Kong'
item.description: Everyone wants to know who Kaylee Hottle is, the little girl who is the breakout star of 'Godzilla vs Kong'. Everything you need to know! Heck, the original cut of Justice League from Joss Whedon was a slobbering mess and even though it underperformed for Warner Bros., it still managed to make a ton of dough.

item.description: - The Bishop of International Godsway Church has made his position known with the death of lynched Ghanaian soldier - The man of God claimed Jesus Christ sent him a message to Whatsapp as he was preparing to go save the slain soldier Following the report made by Legit.ng on the gruesome death of Captain Maxwell Mahama, a Ghanaian soldier, Bishop Daniel Obinim has revealed how he could have saved the slain soldier.

item.title: How to write a proposal letter (with examples)
item.description: Any company selling goods or providing services needs the loyalty of the existing customers and the attraction of new clients. A proposal letter will help you to do this. In this article, we will talk about how to make a perfect and competent proposal letter that will help the company to stand out among competitors in order to find and retain new customers and business partners. The modern consumer market is oversaturated with goods and services; therefore, a well-formed proposal letter plays an essential role in negotiating lucrative contracts with customers.

item.title: Angel Adoree Strawbridge: 10 quick facts about the Escape to the Chateau star

While the couple’s story is very inspiring, Angel Adoree has proved to be the most captivating. A fashion entrepreneur, a published author, and a go-getter who seems to have a magic touch, there are several fascinating sides to her.

This comes after May, in her New Year post, reflected on the devastating moments of 2023 after Yul declared it was his best year. Naija News recalls that 16-year-old Kambilichukwu, the first son of May and Yul, died last year after he slumped while playing football in school.

item.title: Influencer Leaves Son in Economy Class, Takes Business Upgrade
item.description: Influencer Leaves 10-Yr-Old Son in Economy After She Receives Business Upgrade, Sparks DebateBy Mustafa GatollariPublished May 25 2023, 8:21 a.m. ET Source: Instagram | @themomtrotterChildren are the future: that's an incontrovertible fact. Our biological need to care for them at all costs is something that's deeply ingrained in our brains in order to preserve the future of our species. It's one of the reasons why crimes against children and their exploitation of them are so particularly heinous and get folks so angry whenever they hear of them.

item.title: Paul Kagame Emerges As Rwandas Ruling Party Presidential Candidate
item.description: Rwanda’s ruling party has officially selected President Paul Kagame as its candidate for the upcoming July election. The latest development sets the stage for what is anticipated to be another term for the long-serving leader. Naija News reports that Kagame, who is 66 years old, has been at the helm of the landlocked African nation for several decades, having secured victory in the presidential elections held in 2003, 2010, and 2017 with overwhelming support exceeding 90 per cent.

item.title: Super Eagles Player Henry Onyekuru Signs For Greece's Olympiakos
item.description: 24-year-old Nigerian AS Monaco striker Henry Onyekuru has signed with defending Greek champions Olympiakos Piraeus. Recruited in 2019 by AS Monaco from English club Everton for 17 million euros, the Nigerian international has only played 8 official matches with the Monegasques. He had been loaned two consecutive seasons at Galatasaray, Turkey. According to various sources familiar with the matter, the amount of the transfer would be five million euros with possible bonuses and an incentive on a potential capital gain in the event of resale.

item.title: April 12 Horoscope and Zodiac
item.description: Your sign is ruled by the planet Mars, but as you were born in the third Decan, or part, of the Aries sign, you also receive a helping of Jupiter's planetary influence. Mars is the planet of assertiveness, and subsequently is responsible for your more vigorous and action-oriented qualities. In the same light, it is Jupiter, the planet of expansion, that links to your optimism, pursuit of knowledge and appreciation for exploration.

item.title: FG Reveals Cause Of Train Derailment In Niger State
item.description: The Nigerian Railway Corporation (NRC) has reacted to the derailment of a Lagos-Kano passenger train in Niger State on Saturday. Naija News reports that the train derailed from its track at Bode Sadu-Jebba Section within the Jebba area in Niger State. It was learned that the luggage vans at the rear were involved in the mishap and other parts of the train conveying passengers continued the journey. In a statement on Monday by its Deputy Spokesman, Yakub Mahmood, the NRC said the derailment happened due to the vandalisation of the tracks.

item.title: Outrage as Local Government Chairman Empowers Farmers Each with One Yam, Jembe
item.description: The chairman of Obanliku local government area of Cross River State, Evangelist Margaret Inde, has got people talking on social mediaInde has come under fire for sharing a jembe, cutlass and one tuber of yam with farmers as a way to empower themThese items were shared by the chairman during the New Yam festival held on Friday, August 27Many who shared their thoughts on the development wondered why the farmers were comfortable receiving such items as empowermentThe chairman of Obanliku local government area of Cross River, Evangelist Margaret Inde, has empowered farmers with a hoe, a cutlass and one tuber of yam each.

item.title: PDP Governors Dump Atiku, To Back Bola Tinubus Presidential Bid
item.description: A report have emerged claiming that some Governors elected on the platform of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) have resolved to back the presidential candidate of the All Progressives Congress (APC), Asiwaju Bola Ahmed Tinubu. Naija News reports that the PDP has been in crisis following the refusal of the party’s National Chairman, Iyorchia Ayu, to resign, a demand made by Governor Nyesom Wike of Rivers State to back Atiku Abubakar, the party’s presidential candidate.

item.title: Fani-Kayode Berates Pantami Again, Describe Buhari's Minister As 'Beast'
item.description: Former Minister of Aviation Femi Fani-Kayode has berated Nigeria’s Minister of Communication and Digital Economy, Isa Pantami, over comments credited to him in the past. Naija News reports that Pantami had once revealed how joyful he used to feel with the killing of those he considered infidels. The minister said this in three audio recordings of his teachings in the 2000s, when he condemned deadly operations of the then Al Qaeda and Taliban elements who were on a campaign to obliterate the West and conquer other parts of the world.

item.title: Labour Party Appoints Charles Odigbo As Presidential Campaign Spokesman
item.description: The Labour Party has announced Charles Odigbo as the official spokesman of the Peter Obi Presidential Campaign Council. A chieftain of the party and renowned economist, Professor Pat Utomi, made this known at an event organised by the Media Team for the Peter Obi Campaign team held in Lagos on Thursday. Utomi disclosed that the Odigbo would lead the media team comprised of veterans who are professionals, passionate and committed to the Nigerian people.

item.title: Fayemi To Declare For Presidency Wednesday
item.description: All is now set as the Executive Governor of Ekiti State, Olukayode Fayemi, announced he will be declaring his 2023 Presidential ambition on Wednesday, May 4, 2022. Fayemi revealed this on Tuesday in a video clip he posted on his microblogging platform, Twitter, Naija News reports. In the one-minute video, Fayemi unveiled his Nigeria agenda ahead of the 2023 general election. He said, “the Nigeria of our dream is possible, a Nigeria that is the pride and joy of all, among others.

item.title: How to Make Latex in 'Minecraft' and What to Make With It
item.description: You Can Make Balloons With Latex in a Certain Version of 'Minecraft'By Sara BelcherAug. 15 2022, Published 10:11 p.m. ET Source: Mojang via FandomThere's truly no shortage of ways to get creative in Minecraft. While there are plenty of items you can craft based on the materials and suggestions given by the game, players have continuously found new and creative ways to use the block in different ways. For example, using some sticky pistons and blocks of slime, you can make a flying machine to transport you or different materials around your world.

item.title: What Was Andy Rourke's Cause of Death? Smiths Bassist Died at 59
item.description: The Smiths' Bassist Andy Rourke Has Died at 59By Anna GarrisonPublished May 19 2023, 10:35 a.m. ET Source: Getty ImagesAndy Rourke in 2022 Bassist of beloved English rock band the Smiths, Andy Rourke, has died at age 59. The Manchester native moved in with future bandmate and Smiths guitarist Johnny Marr as teens after knowing each other from childhood. Andy and Johnny played with several bands before their time in the Smiths, including one of their devising, Freak Party.

item.title: 15 Politicians Linked To $2.1 Billion Arms Deal Scandal
item.description: When the former national security adviser, Colonel Sambo Dasuki, was invited last year by the Economic and Financial Crimes Commission (EFCC) to answer some vital questions on the $2.1 billion arms deal scandal, nobody would ever have thought the names of some high profile politicians would later be allegedly linked to this national embarrassment. [article_adwert] Allegedly, money which was meant to purchase arms and ammunition for the Nigerian soldiers battling the insurgency in the northeastern region of the country was instead shared among some politicians and used to fight elections.

item.title: FG Directs Public Servants To Work From Home Over Coronavirus
item.description: The Federal Government led by President Muhammadu Buhari has directed public servants to work from home in order to check the spread of coronavirus. Naija News reports that the Head of Service ​of the Federation, Yemi Esan, gave this directive in a memo on Monday, March 23. The Head of Service ​of the Federation said from Tuesday, public servants on level 12 should stay away from work while those who would remain at work should limit the number of visitors that they receive.

item.title: Watch This Guy's Tesla Predict a Car Crash Seconds Before It Happens
item.description: Watch This Guy's Tesla Predict A Car Crash Seconds Before It HappensBy Mustafa GatollariUpdated Nov. 18 2019, 2:39 p.m. ET Tesla's the wave of the future. Sure, a lot of people have range anxiety and the lack of charging stations, but with the new extended batteries the company's offering (over 300 miles off a single charge), that'll soon become a worry of the past. And the fact that you can power your car with the sun and never have to worry about a crappy combustion engine ever again isn't the best part about owning one of these sexy pieces of tech: it's all the insane things Teslas are capable of doing.

item.title: Yul Edochie, Judy Austin Celebrate Their Son's First Birthday In Most Beautiful Way
item.description: Nollywood actor, Yul Edochie and his wife Judy Austin have taken to social media to celebrate their son, Star Dikeh on his first birthday. Recall that the marriage of Yul Edochie to his colleague Judy Austin came with many backslashes as many Nigerians termed it as a betrayal to his first wife, May. Taking to Instagram, Yul Edochie shared adorable photos of his son donning in native Igbo outfit ‘Isi Agwu’ and holding a traditional hand fan called ‘Akupe’.

item.title: Kakamega Governor Wycliff Oparanya, several leaders attend burial of quintuplet's mother
item.description: Kakamega County Governor Wycliffe Oparanya lead a group of leaders from the region in bidding farewell to quintuplets mother, Evaline Namukhula, as she was laid to rest. The late Namukhula was buried on Wednesday, April 17, at Isokhe village, Kakamega, with her burial a county affair. READ ALSO: Nairobi woman with amnesia forgets baby's whereabouts shortly after birth READ ALSO: Top 2018 KCSE candidate to join technical university, pursue aeronautical engineering Addressing mourners at the funeral, Oparanya said his county government would ensure the welfare of the children she left behind was well-taken care of.

item.title: Why Was Queen Elizabeth II a No-Show at Son Charles Wedding to Camilla?
item.description: Why didn’t the queen attend Charles and Camilla’s wedding? Learn more about Queen Elizabeth II’s absence from the 2005 civil ceremony. Source: Getty ImagesPrince Charles, Prince of Wales, Camilla, Duchess of Cornwall, Queen Elizabeth II watch the RAF flypast on the balcony of Buckingham Palace on July 10, 2018, in London, England On April 9, 2005, most of the British royal family gathered at Windsor Guildhall in Windsor, England, to attend the civil wedding ceremony of the then-Prince Charles to Camilla Parker Bowles, the woman he married after divorcing Princess Diana.

item.title: 10 best African countries to live and work in 2020
item.description: While the majority of African countries are still underdeveloped, efforts have been made to ensure they make living conditions better not only for the locals but visitors as well. The continent has far and wide enjoyed some relative peace, but that is only the beginning when it comes to living and working. Apart from peace, people need food and water, but these are still just the basics. The best African countries to live and work in 2020 are those that have gone the extra mile to ensure all the possible aspects necessary for a working environment are catered for.

item.title: HBO's 'The Outsider': The Shocking Post-Credit Scene Sets Up Season 2
item.description: Will there be a Season 2 of HBO's 'The Outsider'? The shocking post-credit scene in the Season 1 finale sets up a major plotline for the characters. Source: HBO[Warning: Major spoilers ahead] The season finale of HBO's The Outsider (adapted from Stephen King's novel of the same name) saw Ralph (Ben Mendelsohn) and Holly (Cynthia Erivo) confront the shape-shifting beast following a brutal attack on their group, which left many dead.

item.title: Sev Philippou - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Social media personality frequently featured in other's YouTube videos, but who also created her own self-titled channel to post reality based vlogs of the behind-the-scenes would of herself and family. Before Fame She worked as a boxing ring card girl. Trivia She made an Instagram account for her dog Esmé the Bichon Frise. Family Life Her cousins are the Philippou twins, Danny and Michael, from the YouTube channel RackaRacka. Associated With She became a frequent video collaborator of Mark Reynolds.

item.title: Ali Atay - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Turkish actor and musician who has starred in films like 2013's Sen Aydınlatırsın Geceyi and on series like Leyla ile Mecnun. He made his directorial debut with the 2015 film Limonata, which earned him a Seyfi Teoman Best Debut Film Award nomination. Before Fame He graduated from Mimar Sinan Fine Arts University in 1999. He landed his first television role on the series Second Spring the same year. Trivia He co-founded the Krek Theatre Company with friend and actor Berkun Oya.

item.title: Btypep - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Comedy vlogger and sketch creator who became a popular figure on TikTok where he has garnered more than 6 million fans. He was also known for posting POV-style videos. Before Fame In October of 2014, he posted his first Instagram activity. It was a kite-surfing video from Hawaii. Trivia He began posting to TikTok in 2019 and often uploaded his TikTok videos to his Instagram account from February to July of 2019.

item.title: Flavour Has Slept With Chidinma, They Are Not Just Friends
item.description: Controversial rapper, Darlington Okoye, also known as Speed Darlington, has alleged that his colleagues Flavour N’abania and Chidinma Ekile have slept together. The media personality made the claim in Igbo language during a live session on Instagram. He opined that the body language between the duo suggests that Flavour has definitely had carnal knowledge of Chindinma. According to him, the way Flavour holds Chidinma suggests that something has taken place under the sheet.

item.title: Minister Lists Results From Other Countries That Will Be Banned
item.description: The Minister of Education in Nigeria, Tahir Mamman, has listed some other countries that will be affected by the decision of the federal government to suspend accreditation and evaluation of results from such countries. Speaking on Wednesday during an appearance on Channels Television, Mamman said the hammer of the federal government won’t be limited to results from Benin Republic and Togo alone. According to him, the sanction of the federal government will be extended to results from countries like Uganda, Kenya and Niger Republic.

item.title: Jennifer Hawkins - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Former model who won the title of Miss Universe 2004. She went on to host the Australian version of the series Make Me a Supermodel. Before Fame She was a cheerleader for the Newcastle Knights rugby league team. Trivia She was initially considered to play the role of Sophie Solandres in The Pink Panther 2, but it was instead given to actress Aishwarya Rai. Family Life She married male model Jake Wall in 2013.

item.title: Lil Durk - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: One of Def Jam's crop of Chicago rappers and leader of his own collective, OTF (Only the Family). His debut album, Remember My Name, peaked at #14 on the Billboard 200. Before Fame He self-released his first few mixtapes in 2011 when he started pursuing his music seriously. Trivia His first single for Def Jam, "Dis Ain't What U Want," expressed his frustration with what he saw as the misplaced blame for Chicago's street violence.

item.title: Raila akutana na mjombake Rais Uhuru Kenyatta katika ibada ya kanisa

item.description: If the 2023-2024 Premier League campaign ends today, Arsenal will be named winners as their major contenders, Liverpool and Manchester City, fail to grab a win at Anfield Stadium. Premier League enthusiasts were treated to the best of English football as Liverpool and Manchester City battled for supremacy, pride, and the first spot. Before the game kicked off at 4:45 p.m earlier today, March 10, it was clear that the winner of the tie at Anfield would become the Premier League table-toppers at least until next weekend.

item.description: Meghan and Harry Have Reportedly Chosen Malibu as Their New Home BaseBy Allison CacichUpdated March 27 2020, 5:57 p.m. ET Source: Getty ImagesAmid the COVID-19 pandemic, it looks like Prince Harry and Meghan Markle have found a new home. According to multiple reports, the Duke and Duchess of Sussex recently moved to L.A. from Vancouver Island after spending several months in Canada following their decision to step down as senior royals.

item.title: Ryan Ziegler - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Older half-brother of Maddie and Mackenzie Ziegler who also has a younger full brother in Tyler Ziegler. Before Fame He and his family grew up in the state of Pennsylvania. Trivia He got his master's degree in accounting from the University of Pittsburgh in 2016. Family Life He and the dancing Ziegler sisters share the same father in Kurt Ziegler from his first marriage, but different mothers. In October 2017, he married his girlfriend Camille.

item.title: Enugu Assembly Passes Anti-open Grazing Bill
item.description: The Enugu State House of Assembly, on Thursday, passed the anti-open grazing bill into law. It was gathered that after going through the bill on a clause by clause consideration, lawmakers passed the bill Naija News reports that following the passage, the Assembly would send the bill to Governor Ifeanyi Ugwuanyi for his assent. The Miyetti Allah Cattle Breeders Association had asked the Assembly to extend passage of the bill for one month in other to give them enough time to make and input.

item.title: Ritual Killings: Timaya Sends Important Message
item.description: Nigerian singer, Timaya has reacted to the recent viral report of a ritual killing involving four teenage boys in Abeokuta, Ogun State. The singer via his verified Twitter handle, urged people to be wary and watchful as it no longer safe out there. According to the singer, everyone is a suspect as even those closest to you could use their loved ones for money ritual. He wrote; ’17 years old boys doing money ritual?

item.description: Hong Chau Is Stepping to the Foreground on Season 2 of 'Homecoming'By Pippa RagaUpdated May 22 2020, 1:55 p.m. ET Source: gettyOur favorite show from the past couple of years, Amazon Prime's Homecoming is finally back for Season 2. After a stressful first season centered around Heidi Bergman (Julia Roberts) and Walter Cruz (Stephan James) trying to figure out the truth behind Geist Group's "Homecoming" initiative, it seems Season 2 revolves around a different mystery, namely: Who is Janelle Monáe's character?

item.title: Homosexuality Is Well Rooted In The Core Of Nigerian Society & Identity - Bisi Alimi Writes
item.description: Nigeria's foremost gay activist, Bisi Alimi 2 days ago delivered a lecture titled “Post-colonial sexual identity and orientation in Nigeria” at Free University in Berlin, Germany where he said homosexuality is very African as much as it is Nigerian. Below is an extract from his paper: Even though Nigeria has recently seen a more active conversation around the issue of sexuality and gender, these conversations are played out on the premise of sentiments, morality, religion and assumptions rather than on facts.

item.title: Jim Belushi's Daughter, Jamison, Fully Supports Her Dad's Marijuana Business
item.description: Jim Belushi's only daughter, Jamison, appears on his new reality series 'Growing Belushi' — get to know the singer-songwriter. Source: InstagramDid you know that Jim Belushi is now a cannabis farmer? The actor gives fans an inside look at his operation on the reality series Growing Belushi, which also aims to promote the benefits of legalized marijuana. The first episode features a cameo by Jim’s daughter, Jamison, who encourages the 66-year-old’s new business venture.

item.title: McCrae Olson - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Reality TV star known for his time on Big Brother 15. During his time on the show, he won Head of Household twice and Power of Veto three times, but was ultimately eliminated in fourth place. Before Fame He worked delivering pizzas prior to appearing on the show. Trivia He's an avid video game player, listing Super Smash Bros. as his favorite game. He has a Twitch channel under the name Chumlord.

item.title: Tinubu, Osinbajo, Osoba No Longer See Restructuring As Priority
item.description: The leader of social-political group Afenifere, Pa Ayo Adebanjo, has berated the national leader of the All Progressives Congress, APC, Bola Tinubu, over his stand on restructuring. In an interview with PUNCH on Friday, the 93-year-old statesman accused the former Lagos State governor of no longer seeing restructuring as a priority. He also lamented that some APC leaders including Vice-President Yemi Osinbajo; Tinubu, Bisi Akande, Olusegun Osoba, amongst others, promised restructuring during the 2015 electioneering but reneged on their promises after President Muhammadu Buhari won the election.

item.title: Victor Arroyo - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: House guest from the 18th season of CBS' Big Brother. He was notable for being the first Big Brother competitor to return to the house after being evicted twice in a single season. Before Fame Before joining the Big Brother house, he was occupied as an operations manager at an LA Fitness gym. Trivia His Instagram account elfitvic is filled with workout videos and is followed by 260,000 people. Family Life He has an older sister named Ashly Arroyo.

item.title: Brenton Wood - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Soul and R&B legend known for the hit singles "The Oogum Boogum Song" and "Gimme Little Sign." Each of those tracks has accumulated over 30 million streams on Spotify. They were featured on his 1967 album, Oogum Boogum. Before Fame He changed his name from Alfred Jesse Smith to Brenton Wood after he graduated high school. Trivia He did not own the rights to any of his songs; they are all owned by the Los Angeles disc jockey, Art Laboe.

item.title: Manchester City Agree To Pay 30 Million For Chelsea's Mateo Kovacic
item.description: Manchester City and Chelsea have agreed on a deal worth £30 million for Chelsea’s midfielder Mateo Kovacic who is set to switch clubs this summer. The 29-year-old Croatian midfielder will join Manchester City for a fixed transfer fee worth £25 million and the Premier League champions will pay an extra £5 million if Mateo Kovacic fulfills some conditions at the club. The pending departure of Kovacic to Chelsea is part of the club’s effort to downsize their total number of players before the club’s new manager Mauricio Pochettino commences his era in July.

item.title: Who Are Chargers Quarterback Justin Herbert's Parents?
item.description: Justin Herbert is one of the young stars of the NFL, but many are wondering who the talented quarterback's family is and where he was born. The Gist: Justin Herbert comes from a very athletic family, many of whom attended the University of Oregon. Justin's mother played basketball at Oregon, and his father played football and ran track at the University of Montana. Justin's younger brother is currently a tight end for the University of Oregon.

item.title: Anambra: My Emergence As APC Governorship Candidate Legal
item.description: The All Progressives Congress (APC) candidate in the Anambra governorship election, Senator Andy Uba, says his candidacy is legal and constitutional. He added that the APC primaries which saw him emerge as the party’s governorship candidate in the November 6 election remain valid. Uba made this known in a statement issued on Monday by the spokesman of the Senator Andy Uba Governorship Organisation (SAUGCO), Ikechukwu Emeka Onyia. According to Onyia, Uba and the APC will appeal the judgment, adding that the court decision was not in the best interest of the Anambra people.

item.title: Buhari Paid London Supporters 75 Each For Protest
item.description: Former presidential media aide, Reno Omokri has alleged that President Muhammadu Buhari paid £75 to hire each of the protesters that organized a solidarity march for him at the Abuja House in London on Monday. Omokri who mocked the Buhari administration in a Twitter reaction to the protest, said despite paying to hire people, the president and his team could only get a few people to turn up. He went ahead to describe the act as shameful.

item.title: Nathan Chen and Amber Glenn Were Once a Figure-Skating Power Couple
item.description: Who is Nathan Chen dating? The athlete currently competing in the 2022 Olympics was once in a relationship with fellow figure skater Amber Glenn. Source: TwitterWe all know who Nathan Chen is on the ice: a three-time World Championships gold-medalist and Olympic bronze-medalist currently going for the gold in Beijing during these 2022 Winter Olympics. But who is he off the ice… and who is he dating? Nathan’s romantic life hasn’t made the news lately, it seems, but he and fellow figure skater Amber Glenn were in a relationship once upon a time.

item.title: Why Is Snoop Dogg at the Paris 2024 Olympics?
item.description: Snoop Dogg's Olympics 2024 Debut Proves There's Nothing Rap's Favorite Uncle Can't DoWe officially know there's no event too challenging or for Uncle Snoop. By Elizabeth RandolphPublished July 26 2024, 10:10 a.m. ET Source: Getty ImagesFew artists have added to their resumes as often as Snoop Dogg. The rapper is an endorsement magnet and often appears in the most random places. Snoop's latest challenge that no one saw coming was the 2024 Paris Olympics.

item.title: Abdulrazaq Imposes 24-hour Curfew In Kwara
item.description: Governor Abdulrahman Abdulrazaq of Kwara State has declared a 24 hour Curfew on the state from midnight today, Saturday. Governor Abdulrazaq made this known in a statewide broadcast on Midland 99.1 FM. Abdulrazaq said, “Lives are being threatened. Businesses are being looted. Public properties have been targeted. This is unacceptable. It is not who we are. “To curb these acts of criminalities, I hereby declare a 24-hour curfew in Ilorin metropolis from midnight today October 23rd, 2020.

item.title: ASUU Declares One-day Nationwide Protest Rally
item.description: The Academic Staff Union of Universities (ASUU) has announced that it will embark on a one-day nationwide protest rally over the implementation by the Muhammadu Buhari-led Federal Government of a “no-work, no-pay” policy for lecturers in the country. Naija News gathered that the nationwide protest rally would hold at the branch level of the union across public university campuses nationwide, with lectures suspended for the one-day protest. ASUU members across universities are expected to choose a day within the week to hold a special congress and also go on protest rallies within their campuses.

item.title: Cuddle Monster on 'The Masked Singer' Has Been Revealed to Be a Famous NBA Star
item.description: Who is Cuddle Monster on 'The Masked Singer'? This week's episode debuts the "biggest costume" in the show's history, but who are they? Source: FoxSeason 10 of The Masked Singer has been one of the wildest so far. The momentous installment of America's favorite costume-based singing competition has been filled with fun themes, jaw-dropping performances, and some of the most shocking unmaskings in the show yet. But as far as the costumes for this season go, we've never seen one like Cuddle Monster.

item.title: Gikambura: Watu 3 wa Familia Moja Wangamizwa na COVID-19 Kwa Muda wa Siku 10
item.description: Kijiji cha Gikambura kaunti ya Kiambu kimeathirika sana kutokana na wimbi mpya la virusi vya COVID-19Hii ni baada ya watu watatu wa familia moja kupoteza maisha yao kwa muda wa siku 10Matukio haya yamewafanya wakazi kuishi kwa hofu huku serikali ikipambana kutafuta mbinu za kupunguza kiwango cha maambukiziKijiji cha Gikambura kaunti ya Kiambu ni kati ya sehemu ambazo zimeathirika sana kutokana na virusi mpya aina ya Delta ambavyo vimewaangamiza watu 12 kwa muda wa mwezi mmoja.

item.title: 61 Persons Died In Road Accidents In Borno Between May And November
item.description: A warning has gone out to motorists in the country to observe all safety rules by the Federal Road Safety Corps (FRSC) even as the corps gives a revelation about the number of deaths recorded in road accidents recently. Naija New reports that FRSC disclosed that 61 persons lost their lives in 33 road traffic crashes between May and November 2022 in Borno State alone. The revelation was made by the FRSC Sector Commander, Utten Iki-Boyi on Thursday in Maiduguri, the state capital.

item.title: Former 'Jackass' Star Bam Margera Is Back in the Hospital How Is He Doing?
item.description: Bam Margera is back in the hospital but this time it's not for what you might be thinking. Here's what we know about the former 'Jackass' star's health. Source: Getty ImagesBam Margera Bam Margera has had a tough life, and we're not just talking about the beating his body took while he was on Jackass. He has publicly struggled with addiction for years, which ultimately cost him his job on Jackass Forever.

item.title: Groom robs bank day before wedding to pay for ring
item.description: - The man was set to wed the following day but had not paid for the venue and ring - Heath Bumpous walked into a bank and demanded for money from cashiers - The groom was captured in CCTV cameras and the police shared the photos on social media - Heath's fiancee noticed her husband-to-be was on police radar and asked him to surrender to police A bridegroom in Texas, United States, has robbed a bank to buy a wedding ring and pay for venue, barely a day to his wedding.

item.title: KCSE 2019: Kapsabet Boys High School produces country's best student
item.description: - Kapsabet Boys' High School produced the best as well as the third best students in the 2019 KCSE results - Leading student Tony Wabuko attained a straight A plain with 87.15 points - The teenager said he hoped to pursue a career in medicine at the university The country's best brain in the just released Kenya Certificate of Secondary School (KCSE) came from the academic giant Kapsabet Boys' High School in Nandi county.

item.title: Max Brown - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Played the role of Edward Seymour from The Tudors and is also known as Evan Marks on the CW series, Beauty and the Beast. Before Fame He had his first acting experience in local Shrewsbury stage productions as a child. Trivia He is best known to film audiences for roles in Turistas and Love Tomorrow. Family Life He married Annabelle Horsey, after a three-year marriage to Pollyanna Rose ended in 2008.

item.title: Okyeame Kwame - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Ghanaian rapper also known as Rap Doctor who rose to prominence in the 1990's as a member of the hiplife music duo Akyeame, who released albums like Shackles and New Testament. Following the band's breakup, he broke out as a solo artist with 2004's Promised Child. Before Fame He attended Anglican Senior High School in Kumasi, Ghana. He later studied classical guitar at Kwame Nkrumah University. Trivia He won a slew of awards at the 2009 Ghana Music Awards, including Artist of the Year, Hip-Hop Song of the Year and Best Music Video of the Year.

item.title: Woman Denied Seating at a Restaurant For Being Alone
item.description: A woman visiting a Korean BBQ restaurant said she cried in her car for a little bit after being told she wasn't allowed to dine there alone. Source: GettyTikToker Sunshine Chavez posted a viral clip where she purportedly was denied service from a Korean restaurant because she was eating alone. A Los Angeleno blog stated that many all-you-can-eat Korean BBQ restaurants don't allow for solo diners, which is why the author of this particular blog was willing to drive an hour to Simi Valley in order to get some grub.

item.title: 10 Major Facts From The Davido, Dele Momodu And Baby Mama Drama
item.description: The Nigerian entertainment industry is looking set to have a magical year in respect to celebrity dramas and the media buzz in the wake of this. It remains to be seen where this leads us to in 2016. From the face-off between Freeze and Basketmouth in late December, 2015 to Olamide and Don Jazzy at the Headies which held on January 1, 2016, the fans and critics are sure having a swell time going back and forth with claims and counterclaims.

item.title: Jenelle Evans' Relationship History Includes Three Engagements
item.description: Jenelle Evans's Relationship History Includes Three Engagements and Two Divorces“I would’ve skipped straight to divorce," Jenelle explained a recent move in her marriage to David Eason. By Alex WestPublished July 13 2024, 12:00 p.m. ET Source: Getty ImagesReality television star Jenelle Evans has come a long way in life since her time as an MTV Teen Mom. She's now married to David Eason, but is seeking a divorce from him.

item.title: Machakos: Woman Laid to Rest after Lying in Mortuary for 17 Years
item.description: - Esther Nzakwa Kitovo died on August 31, 2004, and her remains have been lying at the Machakos Funeral Home for 17 years - A protracted land dispute delayed her burial as one of her step-sons filed a court case insisting he was the owner of the home where she was to be buried in 2004 - On Saturday, April 24, she was laid to rest in her son's home pending determination of the land case

item.title: PDP Clarifies Misunderstanding On Membership Cards
item.description: The main opposition, Peoples Democratic Party on Saturday stated that the National Chairman of the party, Iyorchia Ayu and the National Secretary are vested with the power to authenticate party membership cards. The National Publicity Secretary of the party, Debo Ologunagba disclosed this in a statement released on Saturday. This is coming after some party stakeholders particularly in Lagos State called for the membership cards to be authenticated by Ward Chairmen before the holders are eligible to participate in the 3-man Ad-Hoc Congresses.

item.title: APC's Tinubu Identifies His Two Major Contenders In 2023 Presidential Race
item.description: The presidential candidate of the ruling All Progressives Congress (APC), Bola Ahmed Tinubu, has identified only two candidates as his major contenders in the 2023 presidential race. Naija News reports that after the deregistration of some political parties months ago, the Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC), announced a total of 18 parties for the February 2023 election, with each fielding a candidate for the presidential seat. However, Tinubu on Sunday through his Vice Presidential running mate, Kashim Shettima, acknowledged having only two contenders in the presidential race.

The rap trio has pit out an EP called Clockwork Indigo and mixtapes called D.R.U.G.S. and Better Off Dead. item.title: Alex Ferguson - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Soccer manager who led Manchester United from 1986 to 2013, helping the club win 13 Premier League and 2 Champions League titles. Before Fame He became the manager of East Stirlingshire, a team without a goalkeeper, in 1974, for £40 a week. Trivia A statue of Ferguson was erected outside of Old Trafford on November 23, 2012. Family Life He married Cathy Ferguson in 1966 and the couple had three sons together named Mark, Darren, and Jason.

item.title: Katibu Kibicho Akanusha Madai Wizara Ya Usalama wa Ndani Ilitibua Safari ya DP Ruto
item.description: Kibicho anasema alishuku kwamba DP hakuwa na stakabadhi muhimu ambazo zinahitajika kabla ya kusafiriKibicho alisisitiza kwamba yeyote ambaye anapanga kusafiri kwenda nchi nyingine anapaswa kuwa na visa, cheti cha Covid-19, tikiti na barua ya idhini iwapo yeye ni mfanyakazi wa ummaKatika mahojiano ya hapo awali, DP Ruto alisema kuwa hatua ya kumzuia kuondoka nchini ilichochewa na siasa Katibu wa Kudumu wa Usalama wa Ndani Karanja Kibicho mnamo Jumatano, Agosti 4, alivunja kimya chake kuhusiana na ni kwa nini huenda safari ya Naibu Rais William Ruto kwenda Uganda ilivunjwa.

item.title: Prominent Kano Politician, MK Ahmed Is Dead
item.description: A former administrative secretary of the defunct Northern Elements Progressive Union (NEPU), Alhaji MK Ahmed, has reportedly died. Reports obtained by Naija News on Monday morning revealed that the prominent Kano State politician died last Saturday, leaving behind thirty (30) children and grandchildren. One of the children of the deceased, Suleiman Ahmed, confirmed the sad development to newsmen stating that their father passed away at the Aminu Kano Teaching Hospital (AKTH) during the weekend.

item.title: ACF Supports National Dialogue, But Only Through National Conference
item.description: The Arewa Consultative Forum (ACF) is ready to support any dialogue that would bring about the strengthening of the Nigeria Project. ACF National Publicity Secretary, Anthony Sani, stated this on Tuesday in Kaduna while commenting the announcement by President Goodluck Jonathan on the establishment of an advisory committee on National Conference. Sani said ACF had always supported the idea of such a dialogue, "provided [it] would not take the form of a Sovereign National Conference.

item.title: IGP Speaks On Abba Kyari Extradition
item.description: The Inspector-General of Police, Usman Alkali Baba, on Thursday claimed that he is not aware of the request to extradite the suspended Deputy Commissioner of Police, Abba Kyari. Baba stated this while addressing newsmen at the Ministerial briefing, organized by the Presidential Communication Team, at the State House, Abuja. There had been reports that the Federal Bureau of Investigation requested for Kyari to be extradited following an allegation of bribery involving confessed fraudster, Hushpuppi.

item.title: INEC Reacts To Court Ruling On Anambra PDP Executives
item.description: The Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) says it will comply with a court judgement that dismissed the sacking of the Anambra state Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) executives. Naija News reports that a Federal High Court in Abuja on June 9 dismissed three applications filed by the national office of the PDP and two others. In a letter addressed to the PDP National Chairman and dated June 25, INEC said it has received the court judgement dismissing the sacking of the Anambra PDP executives.

item.title: Kim Kardashian's Business Advice Has Inspired Some Hilarious Memes
item.description: Kim Kardashian shared her business advice for women with 'Variety,' and the internet was not pleased. Here's why her advice is receiving backlash. Source: Getty Images / Twitter / @reputushionThere are two types of people in this world: those who love and respect the Kardashian-Jenner family, and those who don’t. Since Keeping Up With the Kardashians premiered on E! in 2007, the ladies have constantly been at the butt of jokes.

item.title: Rich Sommer - Age, Family, Bio
Buni-led Committee Blames Godfathers, Buhari's Ministers, Says 'Millions Haven't Benefitted'
item.description: Less than two years to the inauguration of the next administration in 2023, the All Progressives Congress (APC) National Caretaker Committee headed by Governor Mai Mala Buni has lamented that millions of people who built the party from the scratch are yet to benefit from the government of President Muhammadu Buhari. This was as it blamed some politicians who decamped to the APC from the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) for lacking the kind of patience shown by millions of founding APC members who have never protested their neglect in spite of their loyalty to Buhari from the legacy parties of ANPP, CPC to the APC.

item.title: George Ragan - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Known as Johnny 3 Tears of rap-rock band Hollywood Undead, which was formed in 2005. With the band, he's performed alongside Charlie Scene, J-Dog, Da Kurlzz and Deuce. Before Fame His and the band's debut album "Swan Songs" dropped on September 2, 2008, followed by a live CD/DVD called "Desperate Measures" in November 2009. Trivia He named himself Johnny 3 Tears because he liked the name Johnny and he had previously been a member of a band called 3 Tears.

item.title: Is 'Married at First Sight' Couple AJ and Stephanie Still Together? Spoilers
TSC next of kin form: download, application, declaration, requirements
item.description: Death is inevitable. No one knows when it will happen. However, it's best to plan for it so that those who will be left behind can receive death in service benefits, pension, or ex-gratia payment. One way a teacher in Kenya can prepare for his or her death is by filling the TSC next of kin form. This eliminates the financial burden that comes with the death of a teacher.

item.title: We Have Moved On Atiku Campaign Team Announces
item.description: The Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) Presidential Campaign Council, has said it has moved on from the crisis plaguing the party. Spokesperson for the Atiku Abubakar Presidential Campaign, Daniel Bwala, announced the development in an interview on Arise TV on Friday. He explained that members of the National Working Committee as well as the National Executive Committee of the party have passed a vote of confidence on the party national chairman Iyorchia Ayu while some party chieftains have been saddled with the responsibility of meeting with Rivers state Governor, Nyesom Wike.

item.title: Nigerians React As INEC Rejects Machina, Picks Ahmad Lawan For Yobe North
item.description: The picking of Senate President Ahmad Lawan over Youth leader, Bashir Machina  by the Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) as the candidate of the ruling All Progressives Congress (APC) for the Yobe North Senatorial District has sparked reactions on social media. Naija News earlier reported that the ruling party uploaded the Senate President’s name on the server of the electoral body alongside its senatorial candidates across the country. This comes after several reports alleged that there have been moves by Lawan and the APC leadership to transfer the senatorial ticket secured by Bashir Machina to the Senate President following his loss of the APC’s presidential ticket to Asiwaju Bola Ahmed Tinubu at the party’s primary.

item.description: Pop music singer and songwriter who has released songs such as "Un Millimètre," "Barbie Gang," and "Click." She built a fanbase of more than 380,000 followers on her personal Instagram account. Before Fame She released her debut single in 2019. Trivia In April of 2020, she boasted nearly 10,000 monthly listeners on Spotify. Family Life She was born in France. Associated With She and fellow singer Louane Emera were both born in France.

item.title: Leadership Crisis Rocks IPOB After Nnamdi Kanus Arrest
item.description: The outlawed Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB) is reportedly being rocked with crisis following the arrest of its leader Mazi Nnamdi Kanu. He was reportedly rearrested in Kenya and extradited back to Nigeria on the 27th of June, 2021. The secessionist was then arraigned before Justice Binta Nyako who ordered his remand in the custody of the DSS until his next trial date which is July 26 and 27. Kanu, who is facing an 11-count charge of treason, treasonable felony, terrorism and illegal possession of firearms, among others, jumped bail in 2017 and left the country, only to re-emerge in Israel and then in the United Kingdom.

item.title: Mikel Assaults Female Reporter In Abuja
item.description: Super Eagles midfielder, John Mikel Obi, reportedly assaulted a female journalist in Abuja yesterday, October 14. The reporter who works with a local radio station, KISS FM, had approached Mikel who was leaving a training session with the team session at the National Stadium, Abuja and asked for an interview, Sahara Reporters reports. An irritated Mikel was said to have lashed out at the reporter, shoving her. READ ALSO: 2015 AFCON: Keshi, Enyeama Beg Nigerians

item.title: Peter Obis Next Line Of Action Revealed After PDP Defection
item.description: A former Anambra State governor, Mr. Peter Obi, will now forge ahead with his presidential ambition on the platform of the Labour Party after dumping the main opposition Peoples Democratic Party (PDP). Naija News reports that Obi, in a letter dated May 24, informed the PDP National Chairman, Iyorchia Ayu, of his resignation from the PDP and withdrawal from the party’s forthcoming presidential primaries. A source within Obi’s camp told THE WHISTLER that the former governor and former vice-presidential candidate will now be forging ahead with his presidential ambition on the platform of the Labour Party.

item.title: What Restaurant Are They Talking About on RHONY Season 14?
item.description: ‘RHONY’ Fans Are Dying to Know Which NYC Restaurant Caused the Cast’s Petty Drama By Elizabeth RandolphJul. 17 2023, Published 11:35 a.m. ET Source: BravoThe new Real Housewives of New York City cast impressed fans with their luxurious homes, exciting storylines, and the petty drama we know and love. One highlight was Erin Lichy, Sai De Silva, and Brynn Whitfield's dispute over a restaurant choice, which was so bad that Bravo censored its name.

item.title: CohhCarnage - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Twitch streamer who is the leader, and founder, of The Cohhilition, which is a website dedicated to game discussions. Before Fame He attended Full Sail University, and studied game design. However, due to the success of his Twitch channel, he did not finish. Trivia He has also worked as a DJ and producer. He has earned over 10 million views and more than 1.3 million subscribers to his Twitch CohhCarnage channel.

item.title: Gbadebo Rhodes-Vivour Bags Afenifere Endorsement
item.description: The Labour Party (LP) governorship candidate in Lagos State, Gbadebo Rhodes-Vivour has bagged an endorsement from the Pan-Yoruba socio-cultural organisation, Afenifere. The group in Lagos declared its support for Rhodes-Vivour ahead of the March 11 governorship election in the state. Naija News gathered that the Afenifere leader in the state,Supo Shonibare, at a press conference on Wednesday in Lagos, made the pronouncement. Shonibare explained that the election is not supposed to be a tribal war but about ideas, adding that Lagos residents should ignore provocative posts on social media because the propagators of such posts want to pitch Yorubas against the Igbos.

item.title: Nigeria's Currency Loses N40 In Value To Close The Week
item.description: Despite all measures taken recently by the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN), the country’s currency, Naira, depreciated by N40 against the US Dollar, whereas the British pound traded at N1912.4400 in the official market to close the week. Naija News understands that the official market witnessed a further decline in the local currency, with the naira closing at ₦1,537.96. This depreciation is considered the most severe in recent times, as the naira crossed the ₦1,500 mark at the official market.

item.title: Two Arrested, One Injured In Lagos Cult Clash
item.description: Two suspects, Hammed Olawale and Japhet Oderinde, have been taken into custody by Lagos State Police Command officers from the Igando Division following a conflict between rival cults. This was revealed on Sunday on the X handle of the command’s public relations officer, SP Benjamin Hundeyin. Naija News reports that the police spokesman also stated that one Abeeb Fagbohun was found shot and has been taken to the hospital. He wrote, “20-year-old Hammed Olawale and 23-year-old Japhet Oderinde have been arrested by officers from Igando Division after responding to a distress call that two rival cult groups had gone on rampage.

item.title: Why Did Beyonc Go Country? Fans Have Mixed Reactions
item.description: Beyoncé Is Going Country and She's Already Breaking RecordsFans seem fully on board with Beyoncé’s genre shift. “Texas Hold ‘Em” is the first song by a Black woman to top Billboard’s Hot Country Songs chart. By Jamie LernerFeb. 22 2024, Published 9:38 a.m. ET Source: Getty ImagesWe’ve been through over 25 years of music with Beyoncé from her 1998 debut with Destiny’s Child to today. And she’s still releasing new music!

item.title: Are Taye Diggs and Apryl Jones Dating? The Actor Dishes on How They Met (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: Taye Diggs Dishes on How He and Rumored Girlfriend Apryl Jones Met (EXCLUSIVE)By Pretty HonorePublished March 1 2022, 10:40 a.m. ET Source: InstagramUnless you’ve been living under a rock, you know that Taye Diggs’ TikTok is a national treasure that must be protected at all costs. In December 2021, the All American actor joined the social media platform and unintentionally set the internet ablaze. Only weeks later, Taye had more than 1 million followers and counting — which he says is thanks to Love and Hip Hop’s Apryl Jones.

item.title: Maafisa 8 wa polisi wanusurika kifo baada ya kambi yao kuteketezwa Naivasha
item.description: - Kambi hiyo iliteketezwa na watu waliokuwa wamechoshwa na udhalimu wa polisi eneo hilo - Juhudi za haraka za wazima moto kutoka Kaunti Ndogo ya Naivasha zilisaidia kudhibiti moto huo kusambaa - Waliotekeleza kitendo hicho walikuwa wanalenga nyumba ya Inspekta ambaye hakuwepo Maafisa wanane wa polisi wamenusurika kifo baada ya kambi yao kuteketezwa eneo la Naivasha wakati wa mandamano ya kukashifu udhalimu wa polisi. Kisa hicho cha Alhamisi, Juni 11 asubuhi, kiliwashuhudia maafisa hao wakipoteza mali yenye thamani ya pesa.

item.title: Peter Obi Sends Message To Nigerians Ahead Of Tinubu's Inauguration
item.description: The presidential candidate of the Labour Party (LP) in the 2023 general election,Peter Obi, has asked Nigerians to remain calm and law abiding. Naija News reports that Obi’s call comes barely 24 hours to the inauguration of the President-elect, Bola Tinubu. According to the LP flagbearer, it is only the court of law will decide the actual winner of the poll in due course. He also asked Nigerians to work for the progress and development of the country.

item.title: Tom Takes a Page From Logan Roy's Playbook in 'Succession' by "Conflicting out" Every Lawyer
item.description: Gretchen Young is “conflicted out” in ‘Succession,’ but what does that mean? In Season 4, Episode 2, Shiv gets some troubling news. Source: HBOSpoiler alert: This article contains minor spoilers for Succession Season 4, Episode 2. While the character dynamics behind Succession are the real reason we watch the dark comedy, sometimes the business and legal jargon can get in the way of our enjoyment. We can typically keep up, but as everything comes to a head in Season 4, there are many moving pieces.

item.title: Which Actress Plays Ruby in Poker Face?
item.description: Which actress plays Ruby in ‘Poker Face’? The actor behind Ruby, Chloë Sevigny, looks pretty familiar to us all in 'Rest in Metal.' Spoiler alert: This article contains minor spoilers for Poker Face Episode 4. The world’s obsession with stories of murder mixed with our love of Natasha Lyonne has spawned one of the greatest underrated series: Poker Face. Somewhat of an anthology series, every episode dives into a different instance of murder that casino worker Charlie Cale (Natasha Lyonne) somehow finds herself entwined in.

item.title: 2Face Idibia Reacts As Die-Hard Female Fan Tattoos Naira Marley's Face On Her Butt |Photos
item.description: Pop star, 2face Idibia, has reacted after a die-hard female fan of Nigerian singer, Azeez Fashola, also known as Naira Marley, tattooed his face on her butt to felicitate his 33rd birthday. The die-hard fan had tattooed the singer on her body and shared the photo on the internet. It is understood that the controversial singer, Naira Marley turned 33, yesterday, May 10th, and most of his fans known as Marlians came all out for him.

item.title: Briblixks - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Trending dance and lip-sync content creator who rose to fame by sharing performances on her self-titled TikTok account. She has more than 5 million dedicated fans on the platform. She has also posted some of her videos to her thebriblixks Instagram account. Before Fame She made her TikTok debut in May of 2020. The video was a POV of an argument with a boyfriend. Trivia One of her most popular dance performances was posted in late 2020.

item.title: Jon McEwan - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Rose to fame as the fourth husband of Coronation Street star Beverley Callard. The couple married in a ceremony in Eccles, Manchester, England in 2010. Before Fame He served in the British Army. His first date with Beverley Callard was set up as a blind date. Trivia He has appeared on the British talk show Loose Women. He was often talked about by his wife during her time on I'm a Celebrity...Get Me Out of Here in 2020.

item.title: Les Ferdinand - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Former star of Newcastle United and the Queens Park Rangers who became the Tottenham Hotspur strikers coach in 2008. Before Fame Starting out in the non-league side, he was signed by the Queens Park Rangers in 1987, where he stayed for the better part of a decade. Trivia For his contributions both in league play and internationally, he was awarded the Order of the British Empire in 2005. Family Life His cousins Rio and Anton Ferdinand both played in the Premier League, and his son Aaron played for Harrow Borough in the Isthmian League.

item.title: SATC Fans Know Exactly Why Aidan Cant Go Into Carries Apartment on AJLT
item.description: Carrie and Aidan are finally back together on ‘AJLT’ after years of going back and forth. Here’s how their living situation could change everything. Source: MaxDuring Season 2 of And Just Like That, Carrie Bradshaw (Sarah Jessica Parker) personified getting “that old thang back” when she reunited with her ex-fiance, Aidan Shaw (John Corbett). Those who remember watching these two make up to break up on Sex and the City recall them never quite getting their relationship right.

item.title: 'Fuel Never Dey You Wan Go Fight War'
item.description: Grammy award-winning Nigerian singer, Damini Ogulu, better known as Burna Boy, has made a mockery of President Bola Tinubu over the proposed military invasion of the Niger Republic following a coup in the country. Naija News recalls that President Tinubu recently wrote to the Senate seeking its support for military intervention against the military junta in the Niger Republic, but the request was declined. Reacting via an Instagram live session, Burna Boy questioned how the war would be possible when the country is still battling with the hike in fuel prices.

item.title: Actress Hilary Swank's 'Miracle' Twins Are Due on Her Late Father's Birthday
item.description: Following the news that Hilary Swank is expecting twins, many were interested to learn more about when the babies' due date is. We have all the details. Source: Getty ImagesShe already has a pair of Oscars, but Hilary Swank recently announced that she's expecting another pair to enter her life shortly. In an interview with Good Morning America on Oct. 5, the actress announced that she is expecting twins with her husband Philip Schneider.

item.title: BBNaija All Stars: 'Mercy Eke Is A Liar, I'm Disappointed In Her'
item.description: Big Brother Naija ‘All-Stars’ housemate, Doyinsola David, popularly known as Doyin, has said her colleague Mercy Eke is a  liar. Naija News reports that the reality TV star made the assertion on Wednesday during her diary session with Biggie. Giving reasons for calling Mercy a liar, Doyin said the Big Brother Naija Season 4 winner attempted to cause a loggerhead between her and . Doyin added that when she confronted Mercy over what she said to , she sheepishly laughed over it, and the attitude could mean she is suffering from some form of mental illness.

item.title: Mawakili wote waliomdanganya Raila wanastahili kumwomba msamaha Murkomen
item.description: -Seneta wa Elgeyo Marakwet Kipchumba Murkomen amewasuta mawakili wanaomkejeli kwa kumwelekeza visivyo kinara wa NASA Raila Odinga -Aliwataka mawakili waliodai kuwa yeye ni mjinga wamwombe msamaha kinara wa upinzani kwa kumshauri kususia marudio ya uchaguzi wa Oktoba 26 -Murkomen aliyasema hayo baada ya mahakama ya juu kukubali ushindi wa Rais Uhuru Kenyatta Kiongozi wa walio wengi katika bunge la seneti Kipchumba Murkomen amewataka mawakili wa kinara wa NASA Raila Odinga kumwomba msamaha kwa kumpotosha.

item.title: Transportation Minister, Amaechi Gets Backing To Succeed Buhari
item.description: Nigeria’s Minister of Transportation, Chibuike Rotimi Amaechi has received supports to join the 2023 presidential race. Naija News reports that the minister received the backing of a coalition of socio-political groups under the auspices of the Southern Mandate Group to join the race for the nation’s number political position ahead of the upcoming general elections. The group in a statement issued on Wednesday shortly after their meeting in Uyo, Akwa Ibom State capital, noted that Amaechi is versed with administrative experiences and is fit to succeed President Muhammadu Buhari.

item.title: Burudani za usiku zapigwa marufuku Kisumu
item.description: Yeyote atakayepatikana amehudhuria disko matanga au burudani nyakati za usiku kaunti ya Kisumu atakamatwa na kushtakiwa. Hii ni baada ya kamishna wa jimbo hilo Susan Kariuki kumuagiza naibu wake, machifu na manaibu wao kuwa macho kuhakikisha amri hiyo inatekelezwa kikamilifu. Habari Nyingine: Kirinyaga: Buda ajuta kumhangaisha mjane Kulingana na ripoti ya The Standard, kamishna huyo alisema visa vya matumizi ya dawa za kulevya vimekithiri miongini mwa vijana ambao wanatumia fursa hiyo kushiriki tabia za kuchukiza.

item.title: Fans Will Have to Say Goodbye to 'The Vampire Diaries' on Netflix Here's Your Last Day to Watch
item.description: Is 'The Vampire Diaries' leaving Netflix? And if so, when's your last day to watch? Here's what 'TVD' fans need to know. Source: CWIf you're a fan of supernatural programs, then you’ve probably binge-watched (or at least heard about) The Vampire Diaries. You know, the CW series that follows Elena Gilbert’s (Nina Dobrev) continuous love triangle with brothers Damon and Stefan Salvatore and the supernatural town of Mystic Falls. The series has been a fan-favorite since it first premiered in 2009 and it continues to be one of The CW's most watched shows, even since ending in 2017.

item.title: MaddenMobileSlay - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Specializing in Madden Mobile content, he is a YouTuber who posts content about coin shopping sprees and pro pack openings from the Madden game on his channel. Before Fame Growing up his parents were both pastors, inspiring him to serve as a Youth Leader in both middle school and high school. He created his channel in October of 2015, Trivia He has accumulated more than 110,000 subscribers to his YouTube channel.

item.title: Police Nab Three Persons Transporting Ammunitions From Lagos To Katsina
item.description: Lagos State command of the Nigeria Police Force has confirmed the arrest of some individuals over possession of firearms. The three suspects, according to the force, were arrested with a large cache of ammunition in two commercial buses while transporting the same to Katsina State. In a terse statement made available to newsmen on Saturday, the Police spokesman in the state, Benjamin Hundeyin, said the suspects were nabbed with the consignment at Poromope Estate, Ijede Road in the Ikorodu area of Lagos.

item.title: Ray Reardon - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Welsh former snooker player nicknamed "Dracula" who won six World Snooker Championships during his illustrious career. In 1979 and 1980, he won back-to-back World Cup titles as a member of the Welsh team. Before Fame He became a coal miner at age fourteen and later became a police officer. Trivia At age fifty, he became the oldest player ever to win a ranking tournament. In 1985, he was appointed a Member of the Order of the British Empire.

item.title: Buhari Signs Bill Which Makes It Compulsory For Tinubu To Name Ministerial Nominees Within 60 Days O
item.description: President Muhammadu Buhari has signed into law, a bill which makes it compulsory for the country’s president-elect, Bola Tinubu to nominate his ministers within 60 days of taking his oath of office. Naija News understands the bill makes it mandatory for Presidents and Governors to submit the names of persons nominated as Ministers or Commissioners within sixty days of taking the oath of office for confirmation by the Senate or State House of Assembly.

item.title: North-Central Governors Visit Plateau, Donate N100 Million
item.description: In the aftermath of the tragic assaults that resulted in the loss of over 190 lives in Plateau State, governors of the North-Central region on Tuesday visited Governor Caleb Mutfwang. Physically present at the meeting were Governors Hyacinth Alia of Benue, Abdullahi Sule of Nasarawa, and Umaru Bago of Niger Republic. Notably, Governors Yahaya Bello of Kogi and AbdulRahman AbdulRasaq of Kwara were absent, and no explanation was provided for their non-attendance.

item.title: Police, DSS, Army Troops Kill 20 IPOB Members In Imo
item.description: Personnel from various security agencies, including the Armed Forces, Department of State Services, Nigeria Police Force, and the Nigeria Security and Civil Defence Corps, have successfully neutralized no fewer than twenty members of the proscribed Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB) in the Orsu Local Government Area of Imo State. Naija News understands that this joint operation, which took place on March 7, also resulted in the destruction of 50 camps belonging to the Biafra agitators.

item.title: President Buhari Travels To Daura On Private Visit
item.description: President Muhammadu Buhari on Friday travelled to his home town, Daura, Katsina State on a four-day private visit. According to information gathered, the President left the presidential villa on Friday afternoon and was welcomed by the state Governor, Aminu Masari at the Musa Yar’adua Airport in Katsina. The Punch noted that the President during his private visit to his home will participate in the All Progressives Congress registration and revalidation exercise, which he stated is very important for Nigeria’s democracy.

item.title: When Was Michelle Young's 'Bachelorette' "Men Tell All" Filmed? Details
item.description: Michelle Is Looking Forward to Reuniting With the 'Bachelorette' Contestants She EliminatedBy Pretty HonorePublished Nov. 30 2021, 9:31 p.m. ET Source: ABCSeason 18 Bachelorette Michelle Young is a fifth-grade teacher in her home state of Minnesota, but on her off-days, she looks for love on national television. The Minnesota native is candid about her love for education and dedication to her students, and she’s proven true to her word. To accommodate her work schedule, producers began filming Michelle’s season of The Bachelorette over the summer, leaving the Bachelorette with enough time to find love and get back to her students in time for their first semester.

item.title: 'Dateline' Shines a Light on the Curious Murder of Snake Dealer Ben Renick
item.description: What happened to Ben Renick? 'Dateline' will be exploring the snake dealer's death. Did his wife Lynlee have anything to do with it? Source: Facebook/Ben RenickNBC's Dateline is shining a light on the case of Ben Renick, who, before his death on June 8, 2017, was considered a prolific snake dealer in the New Florence, Mo. area. Ben became a prominent figure in the snake industry after making a name for himself for breeding “designer pythons.

item.title: Again, Biden Announces More Weapon Supply For Ukraine
item.description: The United States President Joe Biden has again offered to support Ukraine with a new weapons package worth $150m. The American President is not slowing down in supporting Ukraine to counter Russia in the ongoing war between the two European countries. Naija News understands that Biden’s latest support is coming two weeks after his country supported Ukraine with a package of $800 million in military aid. The previous arm support to Ukraine from the US is said to have included 72 155mm howitzers, 72 armoured vehicles to tow them, 144,000 rounds of ammunition and more than 120 Phoenix Ghost tactical drones recently developed by the US Air Force specifically to address Ukraine’s needs.

item.title: APC Presidential Ticket - Bello Shuns Zoning, Vow To Contest
item.description: The Governor of Kogi State, Yahaya Bello on Monday expressed confidence that he would clinch the presidential ticket of the All Progressives Congress in 2023. The Presidential aspirant is not giving up on his ambition despite the new National Chairman of the party, Abdullahi Adamu emerging from the North-Central which is his (Bello’s) geopolitical region. Bello believes he can defeat the likes of Bola Tinubu, the National Leader of the party, David Umahi, Governor of Ebonyi State, Rochas Okorocha, former Governor of Imo State to clinch the presidential ticket of the ruling party.

item.title: Lets Meet the Vanderpump Rules Season 10 Cast on TikTok!
item.description: Season 10 features a slew of returning cast members, along with a few fresh faces. Let’s check a few of them out on TikTok. Source: BravoThe moment we’ve all been waiting for is officially here! The long-awaited Season 10 of Vanderpump Rules has finally arrived, and with it comes drama, drama, drama. This season features a slew of returning cast members and a few fresh faces. From Katie Maloney and Tom Schwartz to James Kennedy's new girlfriend, Ally, prepare for a ride of a lifetime with some of your favorite (and soon-to-be favorite) reality personalities.

item.title: Prominent healer killed in Nasarawa
item.description: A traditional healer, Dr. Dennis Nakowa was abducted by gunmen from his residence at Moro Village in Akwanga local government area of Nasarawa state on Friday, February 18. The Commissioner of Police in the state, Abubakar Sadie Belly, who confirmed the incident, said the abductors invaded the deceased residence after killing a security guard and took him to an unknown place. item.title: Adult Kids Got a Huge Surprise Going Through Their Deceased Mom's Kindle
item.description: After their mother died, her two adult children went through her things, including her Kindle, where they discovered her collection of...erotic fiction. Source: iStock PhotoWhen a parent dies, there's so much that's unexpected about the process. You're steeped in grief, but you also have a lot of housekeeping to take care of. You have to go through their things, arrange their belongings, unsubscribe them from ongoing services. Often, you end up learning things you weren't previously aware of about your mom or dad.
