item.title: Is Addison Rae in the Hospital? Details on the Tiktok Stars Absence
item.description: Addison Rae Has Disappeared From TikTok — Is She in the Hospital?By Katie GarrityUpdated July 15 2020, 9:45 a.m. ET Source: InstagramTikTok celebrity and Hype House resident, Addison Rae, has not posted to her TikTok since June 28, 2020, and fans are worried. The brunette 19-year-old typically posts to the mega-popular social media platform multiple times a day, every day so when she suddenly went silent, fans began to speculate that something was amiss.

item.title: Ola Aina Joins Nottingham Forest, Expresses Excitement
item.description: Nigerian defender, Ola Aina has expressed his excitement over Nottingham Forest’s decision to sign him about a month after being club-less. The former Chelsea defender described the plans of Forest manager Steve Cooper as an “exciting project” which drew him to the club. Ola Aina recently left Torino after five years and more than 100 games with the Italian squad. About a month after, he joined Nottingham Forest on a free transfer.

item.title: Buhari Launches Five-Year National Development Plan
item.description: President Muhammadu Buhari has unveiled the National Development Plan (NDP) which would help Nigeria achieve robust development. Naija News reports that the plan, which would be operated from 2021 to 2025, was launched at the Council Chambers of the Presidential Villa in Abuja on Wednesday. Speaking during the presentation, Minister of Finance, Budget and National Planning, Zainab Ahmed, said the new development will replace ERGP 2017-2020. Ahmed stated the plan which was approved by the president in 2019 will encourage the use of science, technology and innovation to drive the country’s growth.

item.title: Chet Hanks Declared "White Boy Summer" and Twitter Was All Like "Nope"
Ken Griffey Jr. (Baseball Player) - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: 13-time MLB All-Star and 1997 AL MVP who retired with 630 career home runs and is considered to be one of the best center fielders to ever play the game. He spent the first 11 years of his career with the Seattle Mariners, then his next nine injury-plagued years with the Cincinnati Reds. Before Fame He was a highly sought-after baseball recruit coming out of Archbishop Moeller High School in Cincinnati, Ohio.

item.title: Who Is Aunt KiKi From OutDaughtered? Here's What We Know
item.description: Dive Into the Exciting World of Aunt KiKi From 'OutDaughtered'Crystal Mills, aka Aunt KiKi, is best known for appearing alongside her sister, Danielle, and her family in the TLC reality show 'OutDaughtered.' By Allison DeGrusheMay 29 2024, Published 11:32 a.m. ET Source: TLCTLC's hit reality series OutDaughtered revolves around Adam and Danielle Busby and their vibrant family, consisting of their eldest daughter Blayke Louise, and quintuplets Ava Lane, Olivia Marie, Hazel Grace, Riley Paige, and Parker Kate.

item.title: Wizkid Unfollows Everyone On Instagram (Photo)
item.description: Nigerian superstar singer, Ayo Balogun popularly known as Wizkid has unfollowed everyone on the social media platform, Instagram. A quick check by Naija News on Sunday evening shows the singer with about 16 million followers has unfollowed everyone. The reason behind his decision is however yet to be disclosed but such action is not uncommon among celebrities who even sometimes do such as a publicity stunt. See the screenshot of the singer’s Instagram page below.

item.title: Anna Sewell - Trivia, Family, Bio
item.description: English novelist whose only published work, Black Beauty, is considered a classic of English children's literature. She was unable to enjoy the book's success due to the fact that she passed away just five months after its publication. Before Fame She did not received formal education until moving to Stoke Newington at age twelve. She and her family were heavily involved with the Church of England. Trivia Due to ankle injuries sustained as a child, she was never able to walk without the use of crutches.

item.title: Anthony Michael Hall - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Former Brat Pack member known for his '80s comedies, including The Breakfast Club, Weird Science, and Sixteen Candles. His other film credits include Six Degrees of Separation, Edward Scissorhands, and Out of Bounds. He began appearing in season six of Marvel's Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D. Before Fame In his youth he appeared in a commercial for Honeycombs cereal. Trivia He is a member of the 1980s Brat Pack as he is well known for geeky movie roles.

item.title: Burkina Faso Deny Nigeria FIFA U-17 World Cup Ticket
item.description: The Burkina Faso Under-17 team defeated the Golden Eaglets of Nigeria 2-1 to deny them the 2023 FIFA World Cup Ticket. On Thursday, May 11, the Golden Eaglets of Nigeria faced Young Etalons of Burkina Faso in the quarter-finals of the Under-17 Africa Cup of Nations (AFCON) at the Stade Nelson Mandela in Algiers, Algeria. Ahead of the game, the coach of the Burkina Faso side Brahima Traore boasted that his target was to lead his team to the semi-finals of the tournament to secure the World Cup ticket and Nigeria won’t stop them.

item.title: Melanie Deangelis - Age, Family, Bio
Mtoto wa miezi 6 ni miongoni mwa 25 waliopimwa na kupatikana na ugonjwa wa COVID-19
item.description: Idadi ya visa vya maambukizi ya virusi vya corona nchini imepanda na kufikia wagonjwa 490 baada ya watu wengine 25 kupatikana na virusi hivyo. Habari Nyingine: Wataalamu wanasema kuna hatari kubwa katika kulala sana, jihadhari hasa kipindi hiki cha coronavirus Taarifa kutoka Wizara ya Afya pia ilisema Jumatatu Mei 4 kuwa, watu wengine sita wamepona na kuruhusiwa kwenda nyumbani. Katibu Tawala katika hiyo Mercy Mwangangi wakati akitoa taarifa hiyo alisema, 15 kati ya visa hivyo ni kutoka Kaunti ya Nairobi ilhali 10 ni kutoka Kaunti ya Mombasa.

item.title: Jayla Walton - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Celebrity family member and actress who is recognized for being the sister of Euphoria actor Javon Walton. As an actress herself, she appeared on the Amazon Prime series Utopia. In 2022, she appeared in the movie 1-800-Hot-Nite as the character Kelly. Before Fame She played volleyball throughout her youth and practiced various styles of dance. Trivia She was featured in a commercial advertisement for Nike. She also appeared in the documentary No Days Off. Family Life She is the daughter of DJ Walton and Jessica Walton.

item.description: On Wednesday, June 16, the national dailies widely reported about Deputy President William Ruto's reactions to reports that President Uhuru Kenyatta will back a NASA candidate in the 2022 General Election. The papers also reported about the Form One placement of the 2020 Kenya Certificate of Primary Education (KCPE) candidates. 1. Daily NationAccording to this publication, Deputy President William Ruto has accused his boss, President Uhuru Kenyatta of wrecking the Jubilee Party.

item.title: Nigerian Ladies Star Struck After Spotting Mercy Johnson On Movie Set
item.description: Talented Nollywood actress, Mercy Johnson,  has left some of her fans excited after she was spotted casually dressed on the street. Naija News reports that the viral video shows the thespian, on a movie set, dressed like a regular woman and carrying bags like someone returning from the market. The video was made by star-struck female fans who couldn’t hold back their excitement after they spotted the actress on the street.

By Jamie LernerPublished July 27 2024, 4:00 a.m. ET Source: Getty ImagesEven if you’ve never watched a wrestling match a day in your life, you’ve likely heard of Hulk Hogan. With a career spanning five decades, Hulk began wrestling in 1977.

item.title: 'We Would Make Them Suffer' Says Zouma Ahead Of EPL Clash
item.description: French professional footballer who plays as centre-back for West Ham, Kurt Zouma, has predicted that his club side’s clash against Chelsea this weekend would be a tug of war. The former Blues player was hopeful that West Ham will make life unbearable for Thomas Tuchel’s side at the London Stadium on Saturday, December 4. Naija News understands that David Moyes’ side currently sits in the 4th position with 24 points on the 2021/22 Premier League campaign table.

item.title: Governor's Aide 'Masterminding Unknown Gun Men' In Southeast Arrested
item.description: A criminal syndicate allegedly responsible for the spate of attacks on private citizens and security personnel in the Southeast has been busted. One of the suspected masterminds of UGM, PRNigeria gathered, is one Tochukwu Okeke alias Owo, who was apprehended by troops of 82 Division of the Nigerian Army in Enugu following a tip-off. A military source, who spoke under the condition of anonymity, disclosed that Okeke was a Special Assistant to one of the governors in the South-East.

item.title: Here's What Led to the End of Vine!
item.description: Vine was once one of the most popular video sharing applications around. However, the app has since been shut down and some people can't get over it. By D.M.Aug. 1 2023, Published 9:39 p.m. ET Long before the era of TikTok, Vine was the go-to app for video content. In 2012, Colin Kroll, Rus Yusupovand, and Dom Hofmann developed the video sharing platform which allowed users to record and post six-second video clips online.

item.title: Kid Roasts Teacher For Teaching "Lies" About Christopher Columbus
item.description: No one can believe the wisdom that this kid imparted upon the internet after learning about Columbus Day. Source: FacebookWhen we're taught about Christopher Columbus in school, we hear the glorified version. We don't hear about how he probably wasn't even the first European to discover the Americas, how he actually thought that he'd landed in India because he believed the world was pear-shaped and much smaller than it actually is, and of course, his brutal treatment of native populations.

item.title: Kyoto Animation Fire: everything you need to know about the incident
item.description: Approximately 33 individuals were feared dead after a Kyoto Animation Fire at about 10:30 local time on Thursday, July 18. This attack on the studio marked the worst mass killing in Japan since an alleged arson attack in 2001 on a Tokyo building. In Kyoto Animation Fire, the police reportedly detained a 41-year-old man who is believed to have committed these atrocities. This man shouted “You die” while pouring what looked like petrol round the three-storey animation building.

item.description: American actress who was most prominently featured in The Carrie Diaries as Samantha Jones and Impastor as Ashlee. Before Fame Her film and television acting credits began in 2009. Her first movie was 2010's Forgotten Pills. Trivia She produced, wrote and starred in the web series Two Popular Girls' Guide.  Family Life She married Beau Laughlin on July 18, 2015. Associated With While she played Samantha Jones in The Carrie Diaries, Kim Cattrall originated the character for HBO's Sex and the City.

item.title: Michael Peterson Has Books Written About 'The Staircase' and Other Topics
item.description: As of today, Michael Peterson is a free man who’s no longer serving time in prison. He's written several books as a published author before and after behind bars. Source: NetflixNow that Netflix's The Staircase has been released, more people than ever are curious to know about Michael Peterson. His wife, Kathleen, was suspiciously found dead at the bottom of the staircase inside their family home, turning his life upside down.

item.title: Nigerians Will Not Need To Pay For Grain Bags, They Are Free Presidency
item.description: The Special Adviser to President Tinubu on Information and Strategy, Bayo Onanuga, has made it clear to Nigerians that the grain bags are free of charge and they will not incur any expenses. Naija News recalls that the Minister of Agriculture assured Nigerians on February 8 that the federal government would distribute millet, maize, and other essential food items to help ease hardship. However, for almost three weeks, Nigerians have yet to receive any grains or food commodities due to the high cost of food affecting the economy.

item.title: Photos: Gold discovered in Kano state?
item.description: - Nigerian man shares photos of people in Kano state, who are reportedly discovered deposits of gold -He says that people need the help of the federal government because the locals can only dig a little Facebook user Jaafar Jaafar shared the post of his friend Rufa'i Dabo, who wrote an interesting post after he visited Bagwai and Shanono LGAs in Kano. The man claims that these two villages are abundant of discovering gold and other natural resources.

item.title: Presidency Gives Update On Ex-Head Of State, Abdulsalami Abubakars Illness
item.description: President Muhammadu Buhari’s Senior Special Assistant on Media and Publicity, Garba Shehu has shed light on the state of health of ex-head of state, Abdulsalami Abubakar. Naija News had earlier reported that the former head of state was flown out of Nigeria over health-related issues. There were speculations that Abdulsalami had a partial stroke and was flown to a hospital in the United Kingdom Shehu while reacting to the development in a post on his Twitter account disclosed that Abdulsalami is currently in London.

item.title: Price Of Petrol Across States In Nigeria
item.description: In a move that has significantly impacted the Nigerian economy and the daily lives of its citizens, President Bola Tinubu‘s administration, upon its inauguration in May 2023, announced the removal of fuel subsidy. This policy shift has led to a dramatic increase in petrol prices across the country, with rates now starting from around N615. The decision to eliminate the fuel subsidy, long considered a financial burden on the nation’s budget, was aimed at reallocating resources to more critical sectors of the economy.

item.title: Prince Akintunde Congratulates Alhaji Aminu Suleiman (DG TSO), Others Over Asiwaju Tinubu's Victory
item.description: Chairman, Tinubu Support Organisation (TSO) Diaspora Coordinators forum, Prince Bidemi Akintunde, has congratulated Alhaji Aminu Suleiman (DG TSO), Mrs Ayodele Fatusin (TSO South-West Coordinator) and Hon. Tayo Shodeinde (Director, TSO Diaspora) over the victory of Asiwaju Bola Ahmed Tinubu at the All Progressives Congress (APC) presidential primary. Naija News reports that Asiwaju Tinubu, a former Lagos State Governor, had defeated a former Transportation Minister, Rotimi Amaechi; Vice President Yemi Osinbajo; Senate President Ahmad Lawan and many others to clinch the presidential ticket of the APC.

She is also a stage actress, director, producer, and writer. Renée Felice Smith is a multi-talented creative. She made her debut when she was six years old. She has a rewarding career and a beautiful life. Break out your flannels and get ready to jump into a pile of leaves (all while “candidly” smiling as your bestie snaps an Insta-worthy pic of you) because it’s pumpkin spice latte season.  Yes, fall is officially here and that means the return of our favorite #basic drink is back at a Starbucks near you.

item.title: This 'FBI' Newcomer Met Her Husband on the Set of a Hallmark Movie
item.description: Who is Shantel VanSanten's husband? Shantel recently joined the cast of 'FBI' and viewers want to know more about the actress who plays Nina Chase. Source: Getty ImagesRecently, FBI: Most Wanted viewers were forced to say goodbye to Julian McMahon — who was ultimately replaced by Dylan McDermott. Though viewers are still reeling from the loss, a recent episode of its sister series confirmed that yet another longtime cast member is leaving the franchise .

item.title: Tinubu: No Single Person Made Buhari President, There Are Many Versions Of The Story
item.description: A social commentator, Kayode Ogundamisi has submitted that no single person can claim to have made Muhammadu Buhari the President of Nigeria as such power belongs to God alone. Ogundamisi said this on Friday in a reaction to the claim by the National Leader of the All Progressives Congress (APC), Asiwaju Bola Tinubu that Buhari couldn’t have emerged President of Nigeria in 2015 without his support. He argued that the likes of Pastor Tunde Bakare, Atiku Abubakar, Bukola Saraki, Rotimi Amaechi, Rochas Okorocha and many others would have their own versions of how they contributed to making Buhari President.

item.title: Wike Will Still Not Get What He Wants If Ayu Resigns
item.description: A chieftain of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) and former deputy national secretary of the party, Emmanuel Agbo has said that the party will fall into crisis if the national chairman Iyorchia Ayu resigns. Agbo, during an interview with Arise news said that if Ayu resigns from his position, according to provision made by the PDP constitution a northerner will end up taking over. Naija News reports that the Governor of Rivers state, Nyesom Wike and his supporters are calling for the resignation of Ayu under the premise that the two strongest positions in the party cannot be handled by individuals from the same zone, considering the fact that the party’s presidential candidate Atiku Abubakar is also a northerner.

item.title: You've Done Nigeria A Favour By Writing A Book About Me
item.description: Former President Muhammadu Buhari has commended his ex-spokesperson, Femi Adesina, for writing a book about him and his time as the Nigerian leader between 2015 and 2023. Speaking in Abuja on Tuesday at the launch of the book titled “Working with Buhari: Reflections of A Special Adviser, Media and Publicity (2015-2023), Buhari commended Adesina for writing the book. Another book titled “Muhammadu Buhari: The Nigerian Legacy (Volume 1-5)” was also launched alongside Adesina’s book.
